about_the_game:
You go inside and the smell of rot instantly hits you in the face.
Still you continue your search, you cautiously descend into the basement... There are deep underground tunnels ahead of you, you could have turned back, and yet something compels you to keep going, to go deeper and deeper into the darkness. What are you looking for?
It's getting harder and harder to breathe, but you can't turn back, so you keep going forward.



"It lives under the house" is a first-person DLC that focuses on storytelling and environmental exploration.
Travel through underground tunnels and gain a new perspective on the world of "I Live Under Your House".
There's about 40 minutes of gameplay.
Ability to get new achievements.
A continuation of the story of the original game.
New mechanics.

content_descriptors.notes: In some scenes you can see pixelated bloody images and gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 TI
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: "It lives under the house" is a surrealistic horror story about the horror of being trapped underground.
